title: Application error (0xc0000005) after attempting to upgrade to new client.
body: Hmm im trying to figure this out. I tried uninstalling mcafee and repairing my client but non worked. I feel as if i repaired and it didnt work why would an uninstall/re-install work... Any thoughts on the situation???

replies.body:
Do you only have McAfee running as your Antivirus/Firewall? This specific error is common for players that use **AVG**. If you do have AVG, simply disable it before trying the upgrade and it should resolve the issue. If not, try [**performing a clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to prevent any background applications from interfering with the upgrade process.

Let me know if you continue to experience issues.
